title: parulanu vEDi
sahitya:
parulanu vEDi nE pAmaruDaitini paama puruSa vAsudEva dayAnidhE


anupallavi

  sarasijabhava bhavAdi vinuta caraNa sarasija lOcana sAgara shayana


caraNam    saraguna munu karirAjuni brOvalEdA karuNatO dhruvuni prahlAduni brOvalEdA
sharaNa rakSaka nIdu biruduni maravaka varamulosagi nannu pAlimpavayya
